scripts.build:pages: pnpm build && mkdir -p docs && cp dist/editcontext-polyfill.iife.js docs/ && cp example/*.html docs/
scripts.test: docker build --load -t editcontext-test -f Containerfile . && docker run --rm editcontext-test
scripts.test:fuzz: docker build --load -t editcontext-test -f Containerfile . && docker run --rm editcontext-test pnpm exec playwright test tests/fuzz/fuzz.spec.ts tests/fuzz/fuzz-shadow.spec.ts tests/fuzz/fuzz-multi.spec.ts --project=chromium-native
scripts.test:fuzz:ime: docker build --load -t editcontext-test -f Containerfile . && docker run --rm editcontext-test bash -c 'xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args="-screen 0 1920x1080x24" bash -c "pnpm exec playwright test tests/fuzz/fuzz-ime.spec.ts --project=chromium-native --workers=1"'
scripts.test:local: pnpm build && pnpm exec playwright test
